title: Geordie Shore's Chloe Ferry leaves NOTHING to the imagination in utility-inspired unitard
text:
Geordie Shore star Chloe Ferry was once again partying up a storm in yet another racy ensemble, as she enjoyed a night out with her pals in Newcastle.

The reality star, 24, left nothing to the imagination in a utility-inspired unitard for the raucous outing, as she exited the bar with her pal Bethan Kershaw.

But Chloe's fun night out was briefly interrupted when she stopped to care for an injured pigeon perched on a window sill, with onlookers saying she quickly called a taxi so she could take the bird to the animal hospital.

Sizzling: Geordie Shore star Chloe Ferry left nothing to the imagination in a utility-inspired unitard as she enjoyed a wild night out with her pals in Newcastle

As ever Chloe was proudly displaying her jaw-dropping curves in the skintight grey unitard with a revealing sheer front.

The Newcastle beauty flashed her ample cleavage through the unitard's frontal cut-out, and accessorised her look with matching black thin-strapped heels.

As Chloe exited the night out, she and pal Bethan enjoyed a sweet smooch as they headed home together, before the injured bird caught their eye.

Helping hand: The star's outing was later interrupted as she attempted to help an injured pigeon that was perched on a window sill

Sizzling: Chloe displayed her jaw-dropping curves in the grey unitard with a mesh front, and added some height with black strapped heels

I'll help you! The star's attention was averted by the injured bird that was huddled on the edge of the window

Assisting: Onlookers say that Chloe called a taxi so she could take the bird to seek medical attention, showing the star's sensitive side

Sizzling: As ever Chloe cut a glamorous figure in her racy look as she continued to enjoy the single life following her split from Sam Gowland

Chloe reached over the bar to try and help the injured bird which had been perching on the window sill.

Onlookers revealed that the star quickly called a taxi so she could take the bird to seek medical attention.

Chloe's outing comes just hours after she confirmed that she had officially split from boyfriend Sam Gowland.

The couple went public with their romance in October 2017 but split in May earlier this year after she accused him of cheating with Love Island beauty Amber Davies, which she vehemently denies.

Injured: Meanwhile the pigeon ruffled its feathers as it huddled on the window sill before being rescued by Chloe

Out and about: Chloe has been embracing the single life just hours after she announced her split from boyfriend Sam

Loving it: Chloe bounced back from her relationship woes as she enjoyed the night out with her pal Bethan Kershaw

Setting the record straight on their relationship, Chloe told The Sun: 'I'm going back into Geordie Shore house in three days. I am single. I am excited about getting started.

'When you're going through a hard time it's good to be around positive energy. My mum's been supportive, she is amazing.'

Chloe apparently worried her friends last month when she was spotted arriving at the airport with Sam on a trip to Dubai.

Leggy: Bethan also paraded her slender pins in a white ruched mini dress with clear perspex heels as she stepped out holding hands with pal Chloe

Confident: Confirming her single status on Friday Chloe said: 'I'm going back into Geordie Shore house in three days. I am single. I am excited about getting started'

Playful: Chloe and Bethan appeared to be enjoying their wild evening together as they shared a fun smooch (right) after leaving the bar

A source told the website at the time: 'They've gone to Dubai. Her friends think she's crazy and just doing it to stop Sam from taking legal action against her.

'Chloe knows it's a toxic relationship but said she's willing to give it another try.'

However Sam made it clear he had moved on from her for good as he had her face tattoo on his leg covered up.

Taking to Instagram last week, the reality star, 24, showed off his new inking of a very large bear on his thigh in a video, captioning it: 'Cover up on thigh, leg sleeve pending.'
description: The reality star, 24, left nothing to the imagination in a utility-inspired unitard for the raucous outing, which was interrupted as she attempted to help an injured pigeon perched on a window sill.
